caption.p: Nitrite quantification in the supernatant of the BALB/c peritoneal macrophage treated with Aniba rosaeodora essential oil (500 µg/mL) or linalool (125 µg /mL), and stimulated or not with Trypanosoma cruzi. Data represents mean ± standard deviation of experiment realized in sextuplicate; * p < 0.05, *** p < 0.001 when compared with untreated and unstimulated macrophages by Kruskal–Wallis and Dunn’s multiple comparison test.
